title: Sociology of Education - Planning for College and Careers: How Families and Schools Shape the Alignment of Postsecondary Expectations
itunes:title: Sociology of Education - Planning for College and Careers: How Families and Schools Shape the Alignment of Postsecondary Expectations
description: Author Caitlin Ahearn discusses her article, "Planning for College and Careers: How Families and Schools Shape the Alignment of Postsecondary Expectations," published in the October 2021 issue of Sociology of Education.
